page.title: 17Leisure / Children's Games.
page.content: They also have a Bingo Hall in{ {Cwmavon}which is open on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday. In{ {Cwmavon}they have three youth clubs, one of which has a judo club. J.B. {_Children's Games_ The boys play soccer, rugby and dab against the wall. In this last game they take it in turns to kick the ball against the wall. They have to drop out if they miss the wall or the ball The girls play tennis, skipping, squash against the wall and sometimes dab. Other games are often played together such as rounders, non-stop cricket and touch using a soft ball. Sometimes we split into two teams and play a game where the members of one team take it in turns to run from one end of the yard to the other without being caught by the other team. M.E.
